Description: Raised, circular calcite knob with flat base in which appears a very small and shallow, cylindrically drilled perforation in the centre with a very shallow edge around the hole, where the object would have been attached. The edge of the object itself is chipped partly.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.20B, low level
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 111?)
